title: docker
text:
import docker


client = docker.from_env()

DockerException: Error while fetching server API version: (2, 'CreateFile', 'The system cannot find the file specified.')



# show containers as json

for container in client.containers.list():
    print(container.attrs['Config']['Image'],":", container.attrs['Config'])

title: Simple Application Guide
text: This is simple cli application that prints information about Python and the system it is running on. It is build using nbdev and quarto and point of curiosity. It does not considering itself a serious project. It is simple demo of how to use nbdev and quarto.

title: Simple Application Guide
text:
How to use
Import the library


Code
from simpleapp.app import *




Code
print_sys_info()
